[Task Description]
You will be given DIALOGUE CONTEXT and MEMORY.
Your job is to judge if MEMORY contains helpful past information for a language model, representing Unknown, to generate a proper next response based on DIALOGUE CONTEXT.

If the DIALOUGE CONTEXT does not require the model to utilize past information for response generation, say "N/A".
Say "Yes" if MEMORY contains such helpful information and say "No" if it dose not.
Provide a brief explanation for your judgement.

[Format Regulation]
Generate your output below OUTPUT using the following format:
Brief explanation: your explanation
Judgement: "Yes", "No", or "N/A"

[Task]
DIALOGUE CONTEXT:
I really enjoy being a carpenter. It's a very fulfilling job.
That's great to hear! How did you get into carpentry?
My dad was a carpenter, so I grew up around it. I started by helping him out when I was young, and then I began to really enjoy it myself.
That's awesome that you were able to learn from your dad and turn it into a career. Have you done any big projects lately?
Yeah, I just finished building a custom bookshelf for a client. It was a challenging project, but I'm really happy with how it turned out.
That's impressive! You must have a lot of skill to be able to build something like that.

[MEMORY]
Related Evidences: (1) {'Related Topics': 'Entrepreneurship', 'Related Summaries': 'Classmates A shares excitement about attending a seminar on starting a business with Classmates B.', 'Related Dialogues': '### Classmates A: Hey, I signed up for a seminar on how to start a business! I'm really excited to learn more about entrepreneurship. ### Classmates B: That's awesome, Classmates A! What made you interested in starting your own business? ### Classmates A: Well, I've always had this idea for a business in mind, and I finally decided to take action and learn how to make it a reality. ### Classmates B: I think that's a great mindset to have. It takes a lot of courage to start your own business, but I believe that if you're willing to put in the work, it can be really rewarding. ### Classmates A: Yeah, I'm definitely prepared to work hard and put in the time necessary to make my business succeed. I just need to learn the right strategies and techniques for starting and growing a business. ### Classmates B: Absolutely. I've heard that there are a lot of valuable resources out there for entrepreneurs, from seminars like the one you're attending to business mentors who can offer guidance along the way. ### Classmates A: That's a good point. I'm definitely open to seeking out advice and guidance from others who have experience in the field. ### Classmates B: And don't forget to stay motivated and passionate about your business idea. That's what will ultimately drive you to success. ### Classmates A: For sure. I'm really excited to see where this journey takes me, and I appreciate your support and encouragement.' }
```
